main event: A circular light, the size of a small orange, was sighted moving at high speed in Glenwood Springs.
interesting points: The sighting occurred on January 13, 1957, at 15:30., The object was observed for approximately 3-5 minutes., It was moving in a straight course before disappearing., The sighting was determined to be a balloon released from Grand Junction., The report was part of Project Blue Book documentation.
